scenes.name: SB Spotify Latin Fun Playlist
scenes.lua:
socket=require('socket')
local mac = "00:26:08:0b:7a:78"

local client = socket.connect('10.10.10.156', 9091)

-- Authenticate against the server
client:send("login lunaisaac adri0101\n")
local result=client:receive()

-- Make sure the player is on:
client:send(mac .. " power 1\n")
local result=client:receive()

-- Play Spotify Playlist
client:send(mac .. " playlist play spotify:user:ronluna10:playlist:74uhez9LsLRVMBoWYufe7w\n")
local result=client:receive()

scenes.name: LR - Kodi Camera Overlay
scenes.lua:
durl = "http://10.10.10.109:8080/jsonrpc?request=%7b%22jsonrpc%22%3a%222.0%22%2c%22method%22%3a%22Addons.ExecuteAddon%22%2c%22params%22%3a%7b%22addonid%22%3a%22script.securitycam%22%7d%2c%22id%22%3a%221%22%7d%7d"

http = require("socket.http")
local  body, code, headers, status = http.request(durl)

scenes.name: LR Door Lock has been opened
scenes.lua:
luup.call_action("urn:intvelt-com:serviceId:HWPush1", "SendMessage", {Msg = "The Front door deadbolt has been unlocked!!"}, 68)

ctrlable_msg = "http://10.10.10.167:8080/jsonrpc?request=%7b%22id%22%3a1%2c%22jsonrpc%22%3a%222.0%22%2c%22method%22%3a%22GUI.ShowNotification%22%2c%22params%22%3a%7b%22title%22%3a%22CTRLABLE%22%2c%22message%22%3a%22Front+Door+Deabbolt+Has+Been+Unlock%22%7d%7d"

local status, result = luup.inet.wget(ctrlable_msg,5)


luup.call_delay( "door_left_open", 30)

local current_time =0

function door_left_open()
          local current_status = luup.variable_get("urn:micasaverde-com:serviceId:DoorLock1", "Status", 82) or "0"
          if (current_time == 0) then
          local current_time = os.time()
          end
          if (current_status =="0" and (os.time() - current_time >= 30)) then
              luup.call_action("urn:micasaverde-com:serviceId:DoorLock1", "SetTarget", { newTargetValue = "1" }, 82)
              luup.call_action("urn:intvelt-com:serviceId:HWPush1", "SendMessage", {Msg = "Door lock left open - closing now!!"}, 68)
              ctrlable_msg = "http://10.10.10.167:8080/jsonrpc?request=%7b%22id%22%3a1%2c%22jsonrpc%22%3a%222.0%22%2c%22method%22%3a%22GUI.ShowNotification%22%2c%22params%22%3a%7b%22title%22%3a%22CTRLABLE%22%2c%22message%22%3a%22Front+Door+Left+Open+Closing+Now%22%7d%7d"

              local status, result = luup.inet.wget(ctrlable_msg,5)

              current_time = 0
          end
end

scenes.name: Welcome Home Pumps
scenes.lua:
local day_or_night = luup.variable_get("urn:rts-services-com:serviceId:DayTime","Status",23)

          if (day_or_night == "0") then
             luup.call_action("urn:upnp-org:serviceId:SwitchPower1", "SetTarget", {newTargetValue = "1"}, 75) 
             luup.call_action("urn:upnp-org:serviceId:Dimming1", "SetLoadLevelTarget", {newLoadlevelTarget = "30"}, 72)
              luup.call_action("urn:upnp-org:serviceId:Dimming1", "SetLoadLevelTarget", {newLoadlevelTarget = "30"}, 79) 
              luup.call_action("urn:intvelt-com:serviceId:HWPush1", "SendMessage", {Msg = "Welcome home Pumps. Its Night time - Let me light up the way for you!"}, 68)
          else
             luup.call_action("urn:intvelt-com:serviceId:HWPush1", "SendMessage", {Msg = "Welcome home Pumps."}, 68)
          end

scenes.name: Bye Bye
scenes.lua:
local day_or_night = luup.variable_get("urn:rts-services-com:serviceId:DayTime","Status",23)

          if (day_or_night == "0") then
             luup.call_action("urn:upnp-org:serviceId:SwitchPower1", "SetTarget", {newTargetValue = "0"}, 75) 
             luup.call_action("urn:upnp-org:serviceId:Dimming1", "SetLoadLevelTarget", {newLoadlevelTarget = "0"}, 72)
              luup.call_action("urn:upnp-org:serviceId:Dimming1", "SetLoadLevelTarget", {newLoadlevelTarget = "0"}, 79) 

             luup.call_action("urn:intvelt-com:serviceId:HWPush1", "SendMessage", {Msg = "Bye-Bye during night time"}, 68)

          else
             luup.call_action("urn:upnp-org:serviceId:SwitchPower1", "SetTarget", {newTargetValue = "0"}, 75) 
             luup.call_action("urn:upnp-org:serviceId:Dimming1", "SetLoadLevelTarget", {newLoadlevelTarget = "0"}, 72)
              luup.call_action("urn:upnp-org:serviceId:Dimming1", "SetLoadLevelTarget", {newLoadlevelTarget = "0"}, 79) 

             luup.call_action("urn:intvelt-com:serviceId:HWPush1", "SendMessage", {Msg = "Bye-Bye during daytime"}, 68)
          end

scenes.name: SB Pandora Junior Jack Radio
scenes.lua:
socket=require('socket')
local mac = "00:26:08:0b:7a:78"

local client = socket.connect('10.10.10.156', 9091)

-- Authenticate against the server
client:send("login lunaisaac adri0101\n")
local result=client:receive()

-- Make sure the player is on:
client:send(mac .. " power 1\n")
local result=client:receive()

-- Play Pandora Radio
client:send(mac .. " playlist play pandora://859795179349327488.mp3\n")
local result=client:receive()
